dataList.dlg: Hippity hop... Hoppity hop... The rabbit hops in. To smash it all to bits!
What? Never seen a hare up early to wash his face before?
Got any good missions for me? The kind that gets the blood pumping and eyes inflamed... That sort of exciting mission.
I may not look like it, but I'm a nocturnal creature. Meaning, the dark spurs me further.
Oi! If you've got time for silly chatter, send me on a mission instead.
I'm a rabbit. I go anywhere with grass to gnaw on.
Who says a rabbit is weak? Ever seen what happens when you try to fight a horde of starving rabbits?
Don't get too bitter if I wallap you while I'm fighting, mate. It's the rabbit's nature.
That clock of yours seems pretty useful, why don'tcha join the Rabbit Team and hop with me?
Did you know? A rabbit's got good ears, too.
Yeah, that's what I like to see!
Alright, time to eat some grass.
I see with my eyes a fresh patch of grass!
Got some bombastic plan?
Hop!
Go on, get wild for me!
Hah...!
Huff, that feels good to chew.
Dead already? Were you getting lonely or what.
Easy as salad.
I was following orders. You can say your complains to the high heid yins.
How's that? Remarkably strong and unbelievably fast, eh?
My muscles are quivering with excitement. Got anyone else to fight? I'm only just getting started!
No time for rests. We're going in again!
